casebody.data:
NEW JERSEY DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
EXXON MOBIL CORPORATION, Defendant-Respondent. (New Jersey Sierra Club, Clean Water Action, Environment New Jersey, and Delaware Riverkeeper Network-Petitioners) C-878 September Term 2017
080859 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 1, 2018

To go the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-668/810-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
